attributes.action: Mike Ashley to close down all his stores due to Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Mike Ashley’s excuse is “the government hasn’t implemented and rules to close down my stores “
attributes.background: big companies owned by Mike Ashley are still opened despite not even being a necessity. They are risking their lives every time they clock into that store. There are multiple stores STILL opened such as Sports direct , house of Fraser , Game , Jack Willis. Please sign this petition To stop this.
